English: CSV, Excel, whatever you have. We've seen it all. No judgment, no questions.
Arabic: CSV، Excel، أياً كان ما لديك. لقد رأينا كل شيء. لا أحكام، لا أسئلة.

English: One by one. Looking for bounces, spam traps, disposables, and reputation killers.
Arabic: واحداً تلو الآخر. نبحث عن الارتدادات، فخاخ السبام، العناوين المؤقتة، وقاتلات السمعة.

English: With clear labels and a report. You'll know exactly what to do with each address.
Arabic: مع تسميات واضحة وتقرير. ستعرف بالضبط ما يجب فعله مع كل عنوان.

English: Ready to know what's in your list?
You're not alone. These are the patterns we see every day.
Arabic: لست وحدك. هذه هي الأنماط التي نراها كل يوم.

English: No idea where half this list came from.
Arabic: لا فكرة من أين جاء نصف هذه القائمة.

English: Scared to remove subscribers, even the ones who never open.
Arabic: خائف من إزالة المشتركين، حتى الذين لا يفتحون الرسائل أبداً.

English: Haven't emailed this list in months. Afraid to restart.
Arabic: لم تراسل هذه القائمة منذ أشهر. خائف من البدء مجدداً.

English: Open rates dropped and nobody can explain why.
Arabic: معدلات الفتح انخفضت ولا أحد يستطيع تفسير السبب.

English: Emails not inboxing anymore, going to spam or nowhere at all.
Arabic: الرسائل لا تصل للوارد بعد الآن، تذهب للسبام أو لا تصل أبداً.

English: If any of these are true, start here.
Arabic: إذا كان أي من هذا صحيحاً، ابدأ من هنا.

English: ESP sent a compliance warning or paused your sending.
Arabic: أرسل مزود الخدمة (ESP) تحذيراً بالامتثال أو أوقف إرسالك مؤقتاً.

English: Blocklisted, or you think you might be.
Arabic: في القائمة السوداء، أو تعتقد أنك قد تكون كذلك.

English: Last send spiked bounces. Now everyone's afraid to send again.
Arabic: آخر إرسال تسبب في ارتفاع الارتدادات. الآن الجميع خائف من الإرسال مجدداً.

English: Simple process. Expert execution. Real results.
Arabic: عملية بسيطة. تنفيذ خبير. نتائج حقيقية.

English: No outsourcing. No AI guesswork. Just experienced eyes on every list.
Arabic: لا تعهيد خارجي. لا تخمينات ذكاء اصطناعي. فقط عيون خبيرة على كل قائمة.

English: "She cleaned and organized our database with incredible efficiency and set us up for long-term success."
Arabic: "لقد نظفت ونظمت قاعدة بياناتنا بكفاءة مذهلة وهيأتنا للنجاح على المدى الطويل."

English: You've probably run your list through a tool before. It said 95% valid. You sent anyway. Bounces happened. That's the gap between validation and understanding.
Arabic: ربما مررت قائمتك عبر أداة من قبل. قالت 95% صالح. أرسلت على أي حال. حدثت ارتدادات. هذه هي الفجوة بين التحقق والفهم.

English: Every email marked Keep, Monitor, or Suppress. No ambiguity, no guessing what to do next.
Arabic: كل بريد يحمل علامة احتفاظ، مراقبة، أو حجب. لا غموض، لا تخمين لما يجب فعله تالياً.

English: Not just 'risky', we tell you why. Spam trap patterns, domain issues, behavioral signals.
Arabic: ليس مجرد 'خطر'، نخبرك لماذا. أنماط فخاخ سبام، مشاكل نطاق، إشارات سلوكية.

English: Not just data, context. Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. I explain what I found, what it means, and exactly what to do next.
Arabic: ليس مجرد بيانات، بل سياق. كل مراجعة قائمة تتضمن شرحاً لنتائجك. أشرح ما وجدته، وما يعنيه، وما يجب فعله تالياً بالضبط.

English: Not sure if your list needs this?
Arabic: لست متأكداً مما إذا كانت قائمتك تحتاج هذا؟

English: Take a 2-minute self-assessment. Four questions about how you built your list, and we'll tell you what risk level you're probably at.
Arabic: قم بتقييم ذاتي لمدة دقيقتين. أربعة أسئلة حول كيفية بناء قائمتك، وسنخبرك بمستوى الخطر الذي يحتمل أن تكون فيه.

English: "The SOS Hotline gave me extremely helpful guidance. Yanna-Torry cleaned our list and supported us beyond the call."
Arabic: "أعطاني خط الطوارئ SOS توجيهاً مفيداً للغاية. قامت يانا-توري بتنظيف قائمتنا ودعمتنا لما هو أبعد من المكالمة."

English: "Real human expertise. Tailor-made solutions. Not an AI tool."
Arabic: "خبرة بشرية حقيقية. حلول مصممة خصيصاً. ليست أداة ذكاء اصطناعي."

English: "RME provides deep insights our ESP misses and helped us segment smarter."
Arabic: "توفر RME رؤى عميقة يفتقدها مزود الخدمة لدينا وساعدتنا في التقسيم بذكاء أكبر."

English: Send us your list. We'll tell you exactly what's safe to send, what needs watching, and what will hurt you.
Arabic: أرسل لنا قائمتك. سنخبرك بالضبط ما هو آمن للإرسال، وما يحتاج للمراقبة، وما الذي سيؤذيك.

English: Send us your list. We review every address and return it labeled: Keep, Monitor, or Suppress.
Arabic: أرسل لنا قائمتك. نراجع كل عنوان ونعيده مصنفاً: احتفاظ، مراقبة، أو حجب.

English: Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. We explain what we found.
Arabic: كل مراجعة قائمة تتضمن شرحاً لنتائجك. نحن نوضح ما وجدناه.

English: SOS gives you guidance. If you need someone to actually touch your data, we offer:
Arabic: SOS يعطيك التوجيه. إذا كنت بحاجة لشخص يلمس بياناتك فعلياً، نحن نقدم:

English: Email us. Within 48 hours. Often sooner.
Arabic: راسلنا عبر البريد الإلكتروني. الرد خلال 48 ساعة. وغالباً قبل ذلك.

English: You send an email to the SOS Hotline
Arabic: ترسل بريداً إلكترونياً إلى SOS Hotline

English: You receive an automatic reply confirming we got it
Arabic: تتلقى رداً تلقائياً يؤكد استلامنا لرسالتك

English: YT personally reads and responds within 48 hours
Arabic: تقرأ يانا-توري الرسائل شخصياً وترد خلال 48 ساعة

English: We offer real help without charging because it is the right thing to do. Most questions fall into a few common patterns I see every week. Some people need a quick answer. Some need deeper support. Either way, the conversation starts the same.
Arabic: نقدم مساعدة حقيقية مجاناً ببساطة لأن هذا هو الشيء الصحيح الذي ينبغي فعله. معظم الأسئلة تقع ضمن أنماط شائعة أراها كل أسبوع. البعض يحتاج لإجابة سريعة. البعض يحتاج دعماً أعمق. في كلتا الحالتين، تبدأ المحادثة بنفس الطريقة.

English: If you need more than guidance, we offer done-for-you list reviews with expert interpretation included. But there is no pressure. The SOS Hotline exists to help, not to sell.
Arabic: إذا كنت بحاجة لأكثر من التوجيه، نحن نقدم مراجعات قوائم متكاملة تتضمن تفسير الخبراء. لكن لا ضغوط. خط الطوارئ SOS موجود للمساعدة، وليس للبيع.

Optional - but helps us prepare for the conversation.

English: No flags found. Domain checks out, validation passed, no risk signals. These are clear to send.

column6: disposable patterns. The things that don't bounce but still hurt you.

Arabic: Punya pertanyaan sebelum berkomitmen? Gunakan Hotline SOS. Gratis. Tidak ada promosi penjualan.

English: Not just pass/fail. Every address comes with reasoning so you know what to keep, what to monitor, and what to suppress.

English: A large percentage of business domains are catch-all. Validation marks them "Unknown" because it cannot verify.
Arabic: Persentase besar domain bisnis adalah catch-all. Validasi menandai mereka ""Unknown"" karena tidak dapat memverifikasi.

Arabic: Domain catch-all menerima segalanya. Alat validasi tidak bisa memberi tahu Anda alamat mana yang asli. Saya bisa.
not just a clean list. I help identify the root cause.

English: This is the hardest problem to diagnose because there is no event.
Arabic: Ini masalah tersulit untuk didiagnosis karena tidak ada kejadian.

Arabic: Kami benar-benar dapat membantu membersihkan daftar Anda.

English: We catch invalid addresses, spam traps, role accounts, and high-risk patterns that other validators miss.

Arabic: Minta seseorang menghubungi untuk mendiskusikan hasil audit saya (tidak ada promosi penjualan)

English: Skip, I'll just review on screen
Arabic: Lewati, saya hanya akan meninjau di layar

English: Everything flagged based on your answers. Review what applies to you:
Arabic: Semua yang ditandai berdasarkan jawaban Anda. Tinjau apa yang berlaku untuk Anda:

English: Not Sure What Applies to You?
Arabic: Tidak Yakin Apa yang Berlaku untuk Anda?

English: Every business is different. What's critical for a daily sender might be irrelevant for a monthly newsletter. If you're unsure which items actually matter for your situation
Arabic: talk to someone who's seen it all.
column5: Setiap bisnis berbeda. Apa yang kritis bagi pengirim harian mungkin tidak relevan untuk buletin bulanan. Jika Anda tidak yakin item mana yang benar-benar penting untuk situasi Anda
column6: bicaralah dengan seseorang yang sudah melihat semuanya.

Arabic: Gratis. Tidak ada promosi. Hanya jawaban.

English: The SOS Hotline connects you with YT, a deliverability specialist who's cleaned thousands of lists and diagnosed hundreds of sending problems. Ask anything.
Arabic: Hotline SOS menghubungkan Anda dengan YT, spesialis deliverability yang telah membersihkan ribuan daftar dan mendiagnosis ratusan masalah pengiriman. Tanyakan apa saja.
Pelajari Lebih Lanjut Tentang Hotline SOS

English: Review My Emails goes beyond standard tools by identifying risky patterns others miss.
Arabic: Review My Emails melampaui alat standar dengan mengidentifikasi pola berisiko yang dilewatkan orang lain.

English: Tell us what you're working on. We'll get back to you within one business day.
Arabic: Ceritakan apa yang sedang Anda kerjakan. Kami akan menghubungi Anda kembali dalam satu hari kerja.

English: Optional - but helps us prepare for the conversation.
Arabic: Opsional - tetapi membantu kami bersiap untuk percakapan.

English: Tell us about your situation and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
Arabic: Ceritakan tentang situasi Anda dan kami akan menghubungi Anda kembali dalam 24 jam.

English: We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.
Arabic: Kami akan menghubungi Anda kembali dalam 24-48 jam.

English: We'll get back to you within one business day.
Arabic: Kami akan menghubungi Anda kembali dalam satu hari kerja.

English: Get a detailed report emailed and optionally join our waitlist.
Arabic: ទទួលបានរបាយការណ៍លម្អិតតាមអ៊ីមែល និងចូលរួមក្នុងបញ្ជីរង់ចាំរបស់យើង (ជាជម្រើស)។
ส่งรายชื่อของคุณมาให้เรา

English: CSV, Excel, whatever you have. We've seen it all. No judgment, no questions.
Arabic: CSV, Excel, อะไรก็ได้ที่คุณมี เราเห็นมาหมดแล้ว ไม่มีการตัดสิน ไม่มีคำถาม
เราตรวจสอบทุกที่อยู่

English: One by one. Looking for bounces, spam traps, disposables, and reputation killers.
Arabic: ทีละรายการ เพื่อหาการตีกลับ (Bounces), กับดักสแปม (Spam Traps), อีเมลใช้แล้วทิ้ง, และตัวทำลายชื่อเสียง
รับรายชื่อที่สะอาดกลับไป

English: With clear labels and a report. You'll know exactly what to do with each address.
Arabic: พร้อมป้ายกำกับที่ชัดเจนและรายงาน คุณจะรู้แน่ชัดว่าต้องทำอย่างไรกับแต่ละที่อยู่
อยู่ในภาวะวิกฤต?
ส่งอีเมลไปที่สายด่วน SOS

English: Ready to know what's in your list?
Arabic: พร้อมที่จะรู้ว่ามีอะไรอยู่ในรายชื่อของคุณหรือยัง?
ล้างรายชื่อของฉัน
คุ้นๆ ไหม?

English: You're not alone. These are the patterns we see every day.
Arabic: คุณไม่ได้อยู่คนเดียว นี่คือรูปแบบที่เราเห็นทุกวัน

English: No idea where half this list came from.
Arabic: ไม่รู้เลย ว่าครึ่งหนึ่งของรายชื่อนี้มาจากไหน
เครื่องมือหนึ่งบอกว่า สะอาด อีกอันบอกว่า เสี่ยง

English: Scared to remove subscribers, even the ones who never open.
Arabic: กลัวที่จะลบ ผู้ติดตาม แม้แต่คนที่ไม่เคยเปิดอ่านเลย

English: Haven't emailed this list in months. Afraid to restart.
Arabic: ไม่ได้ส่งอีเมลหาคนกลุ่มนี้มา หลายเดือน กลัวที่จะเริ่มใหม่
เพิ่งจ่ายเงินล้างรายชื่อไป เมื่อวาน วันนี้ก็ยังมี Bounce

English: Open rates dropped and nobody can explain why.
Arabic: อัตราการเปิด ลดลง และไม่มีใครอธิบายได้ว่าทำไม
รายชื่อ โตขึ้น เรื่อยๆ แต่รายได้ ไม่เพิ่ม

English: Emails not inboxing anymore, going to spam or nowhere at all.
Arabic: อีเมล ไม่เข้า Inbox อีกต่อไป ลง Spam หรือหายไปเลย

Arabic: ถ้าข้อใดข้อหนึ่งเป็นจริง เริ่มต้นที่นี่

English: ESP sent a compliance warning or paused your sending.
Arabic: ESP ส่งคำเตือนเรื่องการปฏิบัติตามกฎ หรือระงับการส่งของคุณ

English: Blocklisted, or you think you might be.
Arabic: ติด Blacklist หรือคุณคิดว่าอาจจะติดแล้ว

English: Last send spiked bounces. Now everyone's afraid to send again.
Arabic: การส่งครั้งล่าสุดมี Bounce พุ่งสูง ตอนนี้ทุกคนกลัวที่จะส่งอีกครั้ง
เราทำงานอย่างไร

English: Simple process. Expert execution. Real results.
Arabic: ขั้นตอนง่ายๆ ดำเนินการโดยผู้เชี่ยวชาญ ผลลัพธ์จริง
ขั้นตอนที่ 01
ขั้นตอนที่ 02
ขั้นตอนที่ 03

English: No outsourcing. No AI guesswork. Just experienced eyes on every list.
Arabic: ไม่จ้างคนนอก ไม่ใช้ AI เดาสุ่ม มีเพียงสายตาที่มีประสบการณ์ดูทุกรายชื่อ

English: "She cleaned and organized our database with incredible efficiency and set us up for long-term success."
Arabic: "เธอทำความสะอาดและจัดระเบียบฐานข้อมูลของเราได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพเหลือเชื่อ และวางรากฐานให้เราประสบความสำเร็จในระยะยาว"
Sam Cande, สหราชอาณาจักร

English: You've probably run your list through a tool before. It said 95% valid. You sent anyway. Bounces happened. That's the gap between validation and understanding.
Arabic: คุณอาจเคยใช้เครื่องมือตรวจสอบรายชื่อมาก่อน มันบอกว่า 95% ใช้ได้ คุณก็ส่งไป แล้วก็เกิด Bounce นั่นคือช่องว่างระหว่างการตรวจสอบ (Validation) กับความเข้าใจ
สิ่งที่คุณจะได้รับจริงๆ
ป้ายกำกับที่ชัดเจน

English: Every email marked Keep, Monitor, or Suppress. No ambiguity, no guessing what to do next.
Arabic: ทุกอีเมลจะถูกระบุว่า เก็บ, เฝ้าระวัง, หรือ ระงับ ไม่มีความคลุมเครือ ไม่ต้องเดาว่าจะทำอะไรต่อ
เหตุผลโดยละเอียด

English: Not just 'risky', we tell you why. Spam trap patterns, domain issues, behavioral signals.
Arabic: ไม่ใช่แค่บอกว่า 'เสี่ยง' แต่เราบอกเหตุผล ทั้งรูปแบบ Spam Trap, ปัญหาโดเมน, สัญญาณพฤติกรรม
รวมการตีความโดยผู้เชี่ยวชาญ

English: Not just data, context. Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. I explain what I found, what it means, and exactly what to do next.
Arabic: ไม่ใช่แค่ข้อมูล แต่คือบริบท ทุกการตรวจสอบรายชื่อรวมถึงการอธิบายผลลัพธ์ ฉันจะอธิบายสิ่งที่เจอ ความหมาย และสิ่งที่ต้องทำต่อไป

English: Not sure if your list needs this?
Arabic: ไม่แน่ใจว่ารายชื่อของคุณต้องการสิ่งนี้หรือไม่?

English: Take a 2-minute self-assessment. Four questions about how you built your list, and we'll tell you what risk level you're probably at.
Arabic: ทำแบบประเมินตนเอง 2 นาที 4 คำถามเกี่ยวกับวิธีที่คุณสร้างรายชื่อ แล้วเราจะบอกระดับความเสี่ยงที่คุณน่าจะเจอ
ทำแบบตรวจสอบความเสี่ยง 2 นาที
คนที่ไว้ใจเรา
เสียงตอบรับจริงจากผู้ส่งจริง
สหราชอาณาจักร

English: "The SOS Hotline gave me extremely helpful guidance. Yanna-Torry cleaned our list and supported us beyond the call."
Arabic: "สายด่วน SOS ให้คำแนะนำที่เป็นประโยชน์มาก Yanna-Torry ล้างรายชื่อของเราและสนับสนุนเราเกินกว่าแค่การคุยกัน"
สหราชอาณาจักร

English: "Real human expertise. Tailor-made solutions. Not an AI tool."
Arabic: "ความเชี่ยวชาญจากคนจริงๆ โซลูชันที่ออกแบบมาเฉพาะ ไม่ใช่เครื่องมือ AI"
สหราชอาณาจักร

English: "RME provides deep insights our ESP misses and helped us segment smarter."
Arabic: "RME ให้ข้อมูลเชิงลึกที่ ESP ของเรามองข้าม และช่วยให้เราแบ่งกลุ่มได้ฉลาดขึ้น"

English: Send us your list. We'll tell you exactly what's safe to send, what needs watching, and what will hurt you.
Arabic: ส่งรายชื่อมาให้เรา เราจะบอกคุณอย่างชัดเจนว่าอะไรปลอดภัยที่จะส่ง อะไรต้องเฝ้าระวัง และอะไรจะทำร้ายคุณ
รายชื่อส่วนใหญ่จะส่งคืนภายใน 24 ชั่วโมง
ดูสิ่งที่คุณจะได้รับ

English: Send us your list. We review every address and return it labeled: Keep, Monitor, or Suppress.
Arabic: ส่งรายชื่อมาให้เรา เราตรวจสอบทุกที่อยู่และส่งคืนพร้อมป้ายกำกับ: เก็บ, เฝ้าระวัง, หรือ ระงับ
การตรวจสอบแบบครบวงจร (Done-For-You)
ดูกระบวนการ

English: Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. We explain what we found.
Arabic: ทุกการตรวจสอบรายชื่อรวมถึงการอธิบายผลลัพธ์ เราอธิบายสิ่งที่เราพบ
การตีความโดยผู้เชี่ยวชาญ

English: SOS gives you guidance. If you need someone to actually touch your data, we offer:
Arabic: SOS ให้คำแนะนำ ถ้าคุณต้องการใครสักคนที่มาจัดการข้อมูลของคุณจริงๆ เราเสนอ:
ต้องการมากกว่าคำแนะนำ?

English: Email us. Within 48 hours. Often sooner.
Arabic: ส่งอีเมลหาเรา ภายใน 48 ชั่วโมง บ่อยครั้งเร็วกว่านั้น

Arabic: Yanna-Torry อ่านด้วยตัวเองและตอบกลับภายใน 48 ชั่วโมง
คำแนะนำอาชีพ

English: We offer real help without charging because it is the right thing to do. Most questions fall into a few common patterns I see every week. Some people need a quick answer. Some need deeper support. Either way, the conversation starts the same.
Arabic: เราเสนอความช่วยเหลือจริงโดยไม่คิดเงิน เพียงเพราะมันเป็นสิ่งที่ควรทำ คำถามส่วนใหญ่ตกอยู่ในรูปแบบเดิมๆ ที่ฉันเห็นทุกสัปดาห์ บางคนต้องการคำตอบด่วน บางคนต้องการการสนับสนุนเชิงลึก ไม่ว่าจะทางไหน การสนทนาเริ่มต้นเหมือนกัน

English: If you need more than guidance, we offer done-for-you list reviews with expert interpretation included. But there is no pressure. The SOS Hotline exists to help, not to sell.
Arabic: ถ้าคุณต้องการมากกว่าคำแนะนำ เราเสนอบริการตรวจสอบรายชื่อแบบครบวงจรพร้อมการตีความโดยผู้เชี่ยวชาญ แต่ไม่มีการกดดัน สายด่วน SOS มีไว้เพื่อช่วย ไม่ใช่เพื่อขาย

Arabic: คุณกำลังทำสิ่งที่ถูกต้อง การตรวจสอบความปลอดภัยช่วยให้มั่นใจว่าคุณจะไม่เผลอไปโดนกับดักที่ยังไม่มีในครั้งล่าสุดที่คุณส่ง
คุยกับผู้เชี่ยวชาญ

English: "RME provides deep insights our ESP misses and helped us segment smarter."
Arabic: "RME, ESP'mizin kaçırdığı derin içgörüler sağlıyor ve daha akıllıca segmentasyon yapmamıza yardımcı oldu."

English: Send us your list. We'll tell you exactly what's safe to send, what needs watching, and what will hurt you.
Arabic: Listenizi bize gönderin. Size neyin güvenli gönderim olduğunu, neyin izlenmesi gerektiğini ve neyin size zarar vereceğini tam olarak söyleyelim.
Çoğu liste 24 saat içinde iade edilir.

English: Send us your list. We review every address and return it labeled: Keep, Monitor, or Suppress.
Arabic: Listenizi bize gönderin. Her adresi inceleriz ve etiketli olarak iade ederiz: Sakla, İzle veya Kaldır.

English: Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. We explain what we found.
Arabic: Her liste incelemesi sonuçlarınızın üzerinden geçmeyi içerir. Ne bulduğumuzu açıklarız.

English: SOS gives you guidance. If you need someone to actually touch your data, we offer:
Arabic: SOS size rehberlik eder. Verilerinize gerçekten dokunacak birine ihtiyacınız varsa, şunları sunuyoruz:
Tavsiyeden Daha Fazlasına mı İhtiyacınız Var?

English: Email us. Within 48 hours. Often sooner.
Arabic: Bize e-posta gönderin. 48 saat içinde. Genellikle daha erken.

English: You send an email to the SOS Hotline
You receive an automatic reply confirming we got it
Arabic: Aldığımızı onaylayan otomatik bir yanıt alırsınız

English: YT personally reads and responds within 48 hours
Arabic: Yanna-Torry şahsen okur ve 48 saat içinde yanıt verir

English: We offer real help without charging because it is the right thing to do. Most questions fall into a few common patterns I see every week. Some people need a quick answer. Some need deeper support. Either way, the conversation starts the same.
Arabic: Gerçek yardımı ücret almadan sunuyoruz, çünkü yapılması gereken doğru şey bu. Çoğu soru her hafta gördüğüm birkaç yaygın kalıba giriyor. Bazı insanların hızlı bir cevaba ihtiyacı var. Bazılarının daha derin desteğe ihtiyacı var. Her iki durumda da konuşma aynı şekilde başlar.

English: If you need more than guidance, we offer done-for-you list reviews with expert interpretation included. But there is no pressure. The SOS Hotline exists to help, not to sell.
Arabic: Rehberlikten daha fazlasına ihtiyacınız varsa, uzman yorumu dahil anahtar teslim liste incelemeleri sunuyoruz. Ama baskı yok. SOS Hattı yardım etmek için var, satış yapmak için değil.

English: SOS gives you guidance. If you need someone to actually touch your data, we offer:
Arabic: SOS size rehberlik eder. Verilerinize gerçekten dokunacak birine ihtiyacınız varsa, şunları sunuyoruz:

English: Send us your list. We review every address and return it labeled: Keep, Monitor, or Suppress. Each gets a clear label, a definition, and why it matters.
Arabic: Listenizi bize gönderin. Her adresi inceleriz ve etiketli olarak iade ederiz: Sakla, İzle veya Kaldır. Her biri net bir etiket, bir tanım ve neden önemli olduğunu alır.

English: Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. We explain what we found, what it means, and what to do next. Included free with every cleaning.
Arabic: Her liste incelemesi sonuçlarınızın üzerinden geçmeyi içerir. Ne bulduğumuzu, ne anlama geldiğini ve bir sonraki adımda ne yapılacağını açıklarız. Her temizlikle birlikte ücretsizdir.

English: The SOS Hotline gave me extremely helpful guidance. Yanna-Torry cleaned our list and supported us beyond the call.
Arabic: SOS Hattı bana son derece yararlı rehberlik sağladı. Yanna-Torry listemizi temizledi ve görüşmenin ötesinde bizi destekledi.

English: Real human expertise. Tailor-made solutions. Not an AI tool.
Arabic: Gerçek insan uzmanlığı. Özel çözümler. Bir yapay zeka aracı değil.

English: RME provides deep insights our ESP misses and helped us segment smarter.
column5: ESP'mizin kaçırdığı derin içgörüler sağlıyor ve daha akıllıca segmentasyon yapmamıza yardımcı oldu.

English: You do not need to be a client. You do not need to buy anything.
Arabic: Müşteri olmanıza gerek yok. Hiçbir şey satın almanıza gerek yok.

English: ...and anything else you are wondering about.
You send an email to the SOS Hotline
You receive an automatic reply confirming we got it
Arabic: Aldığımızı onaylayan otomatik bir yanıt alırsınız

English: YT personally reads and responds within 48 hours
Arabic: Yanna-Torry şahsen okur ve 48 saat içinde yanıt verir

English: That is it. No booking system. Just reach out.
Arabic: Bu kadar. Rezervasyon sistemi yok. Sadece ulaşın.

English: Email us. Within 48 hours. Often sooner.
Arabic: Bize e-posta gönderin. 48 saat içinde. Genellikle daha erken.

English: We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.

Arabic: Gửi danh sách cho chúng tôi

English: CSV, Excel, whatever you have. We've seen it all. No judgment, no questions.
Arabic: CSV, Excel, bất cứ định dạng nào. Chúng tôi nhận hết. Không phán xét, không thắc mắc.
Chúng tôi xem xét từng địa chỉ

English: One by one. Looking for bounces, spam traps, disposables, and reputation killers.
Arabic: Từng cái một. Tìm kiếm bounce, spam traps, email dùng một lần và các tác nhân giết chết danh tiếng.
Nhận lại danh sách sạch của bạn

English: With clear labels and a report. You'll know exactly what to do with each address.
Arabic: Với nhãn rõ ràng và báo cáo. Bạn sẽ biết chính xác cần làm gì với mỗi địa chỉ.

English: Ready to know what's in your list?
Arabic: Sẵn sàng biết có gì trong danh sách của bạn?

English: You're not alone. These are the patterns we see every day.
Arabic: Bạn không đơn độc. Đây là những mô hình chúng tôi thấy mỗi ngày.

English: No idea where half this list came from.
Arabic: Không biết một nửa danh sách này đến từ đâu.
Một công cụ bảo sạch. Cái khác bảo rủi ro.

English: Scared to remove subscribers, even the ones who never open.
Arabic: Sợ xóa người đăng ký, ngay cả những người không bao giờ mở email.

English: Haven't emailed this list in months. Afraid to restart.
Arabic: Chưa gửi email cho danh sách này trong nhiều tháng. Sợ bắt đầu lại.
Vừa trả tiền làm sạch danh sách hôm qua. Hôm nay vẫn bị Bounce.

English: Open rates dropped and nobody can explain why.
Arabic: Tỷ lệ mở giảm và không ai giải thích được tại sao.
Danh sách cứ tăng. Doanh thu thì không.

English: Emails not inboxing anymore, going to spam or nowhere at all.
Arabic: Email không vào inbox nữa, mà vào spam hoặc biến mất luôn.

English: If any of these are true, start here.
Arabic: Nếu bất kỳ điều nào sau đây là đúng, hãy bắt đầu từ đây.

English: ESP sent a compliance warning or paused your sending.
Arabic: ESP gửi cảnh báo tuân thủ hoặc tạm dừng việc gửi của bạn.

English: Blocklisted, or you think you might be.
Arabic: Bị đưa vào Blocklist, hoặc bạn nghĩ mình có thể bị.

English: Last send spiked bounces. Now everyone's afraid to send again.
Arabic: Lần gửi cuối cùng tỷ lệ bounce tăng vọt. Giờ ai cũng sợ gửi lại.
Cách chúng tôi thực sự làm việc

English: Simple process. Expert execution. Real results.
Arabic: Quy trình đơn giản. Thực thi bởi chuyên gia. Kết quả thực tế.

English: No outsourcing. No AI guesswork. Just experienced eyes on every list.
Arabic: Không thuê ngoài. Không đoán mò bằng AI. Chỉ có con mắt kinh nghiệm trên từng danh sách.

English: "She cleaned and organized our database with incredible efficiency and set us up for long-term success."
Arabic: "Cô ấy đã làm sạch và tổ chức cơ sở dữ liệu của chúng tôi hiệu quả đáng kinh ngạc và thiết lập cho chúng tôi thành công lâu dài."

English: You've probably run your list through a tool before. It said 95% valid. You sent anyway. Bounces happened. That's the gap between validation and understanding.
Arabic: Bạn có thể đã chạy danh sách qua công cụ. Nó báo 95% hợp lệ. Bạn gửi đi. Bounce vẫn xảy ra. Đó là khoảng cách giữa validation và sự thấu hiểu.
Những gì bạn thực sự nhận được

English: Every email marked Keep, Monitor, or Suppress. No ambiguity, no guessing what to do next.
Arabic: Mỗi email được dán nhãn Giữ, Theo dõi, hoặc Chặn. Không mơ hồ, không phải đoán bước tiếp theo.

English: Not just 'risky', we tell you why. Spam trap patterns, domain issues, behavioral signals.
Arabic: Không chỉ là 'rủi ro', chúng tôi cho biết tại sao. Mô hình bẫy spam, vấn đề tên miền, tín hiệu hành vi.
Bao gồm diễn giải của chuyên gia

English: Not just data, context. Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. I explain what I found, what it means, and exactly what to do next.
Arabic: Không chỉ dữ liệu, mà là ngữ cảnh. Mỗi đánh giá bao gồm phần giải thích kết quả. Tôi giải thích những gì tôi tìm thấy, ý nghĩa của nó và chính xác cần làm gì tiếp theo.

English: Not sure if your list needs this?
Arabic: Không chắc danh sách của bạn có cần điều này không?

English: Take a 2-minute self-assessment. Four questions about how you built your list, and we'll tell you what risk level you're probably at.
Arabic: Làm bài tự đánh giá 2 phút. Bốn câu hỏi về cách bạn xây dựng danh sách, và chúng tôi sẽ cho bạn biết mức độ rủi ro của bạn.
Làm Bài Kiểm Tra Rủi Ro
Những người đã tin tưởng chúng tôi
Phản hồi thực tế từ những người gửi thực tế.

English: "The SOS Hotline gave me extremely helpful guidance. Yanna-Torry cleaned our list and supported us beyond the call."
Arabic: "SOS Hotline đã cho tôi hướng dẫn cực kỳ hữu ích. Yanna-Torry đã làm sạch danh sách và hỗ trợ chúng tôi vượt quá mong đợi."

English: "Real human expertise. Tailor-made solutions. Not an AI tool."
Arabic: "Chuyên môn con người thực sự. Giải pháp thiết kế riêng. Không phải công cụ AI."

English: "RME provides deep insights our ESP misses and helped us segment smarter."
Arabic: "RME cung cấp thông tin chuyên sâu mà ESP của chúng tôi bỏ lỡ và giúp chúng tôi phân khúc thông minh hơn."

English: Send us your list. We'll tell you exactly what's safe to send, what needs watching, and what will hurt you.
Arabic: Gửi danh sách cho chúng tôi. Chúng tôi sẽ cho biết chính xác cái nào an toàn, cái nào cần theo dõi và cái nào sẽ làm hại bạn.
Hầu hết danh sách được trả lại trong vòng 24 giờ.
Xem Những Gì Bạn Nhận Được

English: Send us your list. We review every address and return it labeled: Keep, Monitor, or Suppress.
Arabic: Gửi danh sách cho chúng tôi. Chúng tôi xem xét từng địa chỉ và trả lại với nhãn: Giữ, Theo dõi, hoặc Chặn.

English: Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. We explain what we found.
Arabic: Mỗi đánh giá danh sách bao gồm phần giải thích kết quả. Chúng tôi giải thích những gì chúng tôi tìm thấy.

English: SOS gives you guidance. If you need someone to actually touch your data, we offer:
Arabic: SOS cung cấp hướng dẫn. Nếu bạn cần ai đó thực sự xử lý dữ liệu của bạn, chúng tôi cung cấp:

English: Email us. Within 48 hours. Often sooner.
Arabic: Gửi email cho chúng tôi. Trong vòng 48 giờ. Thường sớm hơn.

English: You send an email to the SOS Hotline
Arabic: Bạn gửi email đến SOS Hotline

English: You receive an automatic reply confirming we got it
Arabic: Bạn nhận được trả lời tự động xác nhận chúng tôi đã nhận được

English: YT personally reads and responds within 48 hours
Arabic: Yanna-Torry đích thân đọc và trả lời trong vòng 48 giờ

English: We offer real help without charging because it is the right thing to do. Most questions fall into a few common patterns I see every week. Some people need a quick answer. Some need deeper support. Either way, the conversation starts the same.
Arabic: Chúng tôi cung cấp sự trợ giúp thực sự mà không tính phí đơn giản vì đó là điều đúng đắn nên làm. Hầu hết các câu hỏi rơi vào một vài mẫu phổ biến mà tôi thấy hàng tuần. Một số người cần câu trả lời nhanh. Một số cần hỗ trợ sâu hơn. Dù thế nào, cuộc trò chuyện bắt đầu giống nhau.

English: If you need more than guidance, we offer done-for-you list reviews with expert interpretation included. But there is no pressure. The SOS Hotline exists to help, not to sell.
Arabic: Nếu bạn cần nhiều hơn sự hướng dẫn, chúng tôi cung cấp các đánh giá danh sách trọn gói bao gồm diễn giải của chuyên gia. Nhưng không có áp lực. SOS Hotline tồn tại để giúp đỡ, không phải để bán hàng.

English: SOS gives you guidance. If you need someone to actually touch your data, we offer:
Arabic: SOS cung cấp hướng dẫn. Nếu bạn cần ai đó thực sự xử lý dữ liệu của bạn, chúng tôi cung cấp:

English: Send us your list. We review every address and return it labeled: Keep, Monitor, or Suppress. Each gets a clear label, a definition, and why it matters.
Arabic: Gửi danh sách cho chúng tôi. Chúng tôi xem xét từng địa chỉ và trả lại với nhãn: Giữ, Theo dõi, hoặc Chặn. Mỗi nhãn có định nghĩa rõ ràng và lý do tại sao nó quan trọng.

English: Every list review includes a walkthrough of your results. We explain what we found, what it means, and what to do next. Included free with every cleaning.
Arabic: Mỗi đánh giá danh sách bao gồm phần giải thích kết quả. Chúng tôi giải thích những gì chúng tôi tìm thấy, ý nghĩa của nó và bước tiếp theo. Bao gồm miễn phí với mỗi lần làm sạch.

English: The SOS Hotline gave me extremely helpful guidance. Yanna-Torry cleaned our list and supported us beyond the call.
Arabic: SOS Hotline đã cho tôi hướng dẫn cực kỳ hữu ích. Yanna-Torry đã làm sạch danh sách của chúng tôi và hỗ trợ chúng tôi vượt quá mong đợi.

English: Real human expertise. Tailor-made solutions. Not an AI tool.
Arabic: Chuyên môn con người thực sự. Giải pháp thiết kế riêng. Không phải công cụ AI.

Arabic: RME cung cấp thông tin chuyên sâu mà ESP của chúng tôi bỏ lỡ và giúp chúng tôi phân khúc thông minh hơn.

English: You do not need to be a client. You do not need to buy anything.
Arabic: Bạn không cần phải là khách hàng. Bạn không cần phải mua bất cứ thứ gì.

English: ...and anything else you are wondering about.
Arabic: ...và bất cứ điều gì khác mà bạn đang thắc mắc.

English: You send an email to the SOS Hotline
Arabic: Bạn gửi email đến SOS Hotline

English: You receive an automatic reply confirming we got it
Arabic: Bạn nhận được trả lời tự động xác nhận chúng tôi đã nhận được

English: YT personally reads and responds within 48 hours
Arabic: Yanna-Torry đích thân đọc và trả lời trong vòng 48 giờ

English: That is it. No booking system. Just reach out.
Arabic: Chỉ vậy thôi. Không có hệ thống đặt chỗ. Chỉ cần liên hệ.

English: Email us. Within 48 hours. Often sooner.
Arabic: Gửi email cho chúng tôi. Trong vòng 48 giờ. Thường sớm hơn.
Câu hỏi về email của bạn là gì?

English: We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.
Arabic: Chúng tôi sẽ phản hồi trong vòng 24-48 giờ.
